It‚Äôs delightfully satisfying to breed, hatch, and raise dragons with an array of elemental abilities, and then enter them in Pok√©mon-style battles against friends or exciting league tournaments. If you‚Äôre a more peaceful dragon-lord in search of relaxation, simply clear land, build habitats, and develop enough farms to feed your ever-growing population of wily wyverns.
